metadata.inclusion:
1. Press & hold the Z-Wave inclusion button for 5 seconds.
2. When the Z-Wave LED blinks rapidly, release the Z-Wave inclusion button.
3. The DoorCam will try inclusion for 30 seconds.
4. If inclusion was successful, the Z-Wave LED will turn off.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Press & hold 'Z-Wave' button for 5 seconds.
2. When Z-Wave LED blinks with 250ms interval, release 'Z-Wave' button.
3. DoorCam will try exclusion for 30sec.
4. Z-Wave LED will be turned on if exclusion is successful.
metadata.reset:
1. Hold the 'Z-Wave' button for 10 seconds.
2. When Z-Wave LED stops blinking after 10 seconds, release Z-Wave button.
3. When factory reset is successful, LED will be on.
